name: Medium
description:
Explore the Realm of Dreams and the Realm of Nightmares in this Off-Inspired mini rpg! You play as the Dreamer, who seeks to see as much as the world as possible, even if it means destroying what he leaves behind. Will you reach the end, or will you wake up before the Finale? Only one way to find out.

Play both hidden fights before each boss for best results.

Controls:

Z - Interact

Arrow Keys - Move

Featuring music by Music Director Isobel Brock! Find the game's OST and more of her work here:

https://soundcloud.com/isobee/sets/ge-jam-3-medium

All artwork and programming credit to Adrienn Tindall

Special thanks to Andy <3

Made for the GE #3 Jam
